com.qmuiteam.qmui.qqface

类 QMUIQQFaceCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qmuiteam.qmui.qqface.QMUIQQFaceCompiler

  • public class QMUIQQFaceCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    QMUIQQFaceView 的内容解析器，将文本内容解析成 QMUIQQFaceView 想要的数据格式。
